texts.text: DIGITAL ECONOMY AND INNOVATION DEVELOPMENT FUND ACT, 2025

texts.label: text
texts.orig: An Act to establish the Digital Economy and Innovation Development Fund to provide financial and technical support for digital infrastructure, innovation, skills development, entrepreneurship, and inclusive access to digital services; to ensure sustainable, transparent, and accountable use of resources; and to provide for related matters.
texts.text: An Act to establish the Digital Economy and Innovation Development Fund to provide financial and technical support for digital infrastructure, innovation, skills development, entrepreneurship, and inclusive access to digital services; to ensure sustainable, transparent, and accountable use of resources; and to provide for related matters.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 4. The object of the Fund is to provide financial and non-financial support to facilitate and accelerate
texts.text: The object of the Fund is to provide financial and non-financial support to facilitate and accelerate

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (a) universal  access  to  digital  infrastructure  and  services  in  underserved  and unserved  areas  to  close  coverage,  upgrade,  and  usage  gaps  in  broadband  and digital service delivery across the country;
texts.text: (a) universal  access  to  digital  infrastructure  and  services  in  underserved  and unserved  areas  to  close  coverage,  upgrade,  and  usage  gaps  in  broadband  and digital service delivery across the country;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (b) the growth of the digital economy of the Country through support for innovation, entrepreneurship, and technology development;
texts.text: (b) the growth of the digital economy of the Country through support for innovation, entrepreneurship, and technology development;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (c) the development of a digitally skilled and inclusive workforce; and
texts.text: (c) the development of a digitally skilled and inclusive workforce; and

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (d) the  deployment  of  digital  solutions  that  enhance  governance,  service  delivery, productivity, and job creation.
texts.text: (d) the  deployment  of  digital  solutions  that  enhance  governance,  service  delivery, productivity, and job creation.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (b) provide  resources,  grants,  subsidies,  co-financing  or  other  support  to  eligible digital economy and innovation projects;
texts.text: (b) provide  resources,  grants,  subsidies,  co-financing  or  other  support  to  eligible digital economy and innovation projects;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (c) promote investments in broadband and connectivity infrastructure in underserved and unserved areas;
texts.text: (c) promote investments in broadband and connectivity infrastructure in underserved and unserved areas;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (d) support digital entrepreneurship, start-ups, innovation hubs and FinTech initiatives;
texts.text: (d) support digital entrepreneurship, start-ups, innovation hubs and FinTech initiatives;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (e) finance programmes for digital skills development including youth, women and vulnerable groups;
texts.text: (e) finance programmes for digital skills development including youth, women and vulnerable groups;
